parameters.name: DatabaseAccountId
parameters.description:
The ID of the database account to modify.

>  You can call the [ListDatabaseAccounts](~~2758839~~) operation to query the database account ID.

parameters.name: DatabaseAccountName
parameters.description: The new username of the database account. The username can be up to 128 characters in length.

parameters.name: DatabaseSchema
parameters.description: The new name of the database. This parameter is required if the database engine is PostgreSQL or Oracle.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host that manages the database account to modify.

> You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the bastion host ID.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The new password of the database account.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host that manages the database account to modify.

>  For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
